li.label: ate insect meat-paste
li.description: Not only did I consume nutrient-paste from a tube, but it was made from gray, slimy insect meat. The gear-oil from the machine partly covered the taste, but the texture and aftertaste were still easily identifiable.

li.label: ate insect meat-brick
li.description: Not only did I consume a brick of dehydrated nutrient-paste, but it was made from gray, slimy insect meat. The gear-oil and burnt flavor from the machine partly covered the taste, but the texture and aftertaste were still easily identifiable.
